summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, introducing a new paralegal who will be assisting on the Maxwell case and who has custody of a hard drive for pickup.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, working in the Southern District of New York on the Maxwell case, coordinating access to a hard drive.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A new paralegal has been assigned to assist on the Maxwell case as of September 2020.
The paralegal has physical custody of a hard drive related to the case.
Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York are actively managing evidence (a hard drive) in the Maxwell case.
